questions.question: What is the main function of an electric motor?
options: To convert electrical energy to mechanical energy
To convert mechanical energy to electrical energy
questions.answer: To convert electrical energy to mechanical energy

questions.question: What is the main function of an electric generator?
options: To convert electrical energy to mechanical energy
To convert mechanical energy to electrical energy
questions.answer: To convert mechanical energy to electrical energy

questions.question: What type of motor is commonly used in household appliances?
